trans-unit.source: Provides a format-independent mechanism for transferring data.
trans-unit.target: 为传送数据提供与格式无关的机制。

trans-unit.source: The `IDataObject` interface is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class and in drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: `IDataObject`接口由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类和在拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> methods allow the user to store data in multiple formats in an instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 在类中实现时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>方法允许用户以类的实例中的多个格式存储数据。

trans-unit.source: Storing data in more than one format increases the chance that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can retrieve the stored data.
trans-unit.target: 将数据存储在多个格式可能性目标应用程序，你可能不知道，其格式要求，可以检索存储的数据。

trans-unit.source: To store data in an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.SetData%2A> method and specify the data format in the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要在实例中存储数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.SetData%2A>方法并指定数据格式以`format`参数。

trans-unit.source: Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` if you do not want stored data to be converted to another format when it is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 设置`autoConvert`参数`false`如果不希望存储的数据会在检索时要转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: Invoke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.SetData%2A> multiple times on one instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> to store data in more than one format.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.SetData%2A>上的一个实例多次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>以多种格式存储数据。

trans-unit.source: You retrieve stored data from an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A> method and specifying the data format in the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 检索存储的数据从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>方法和指定数据格式在`format`参数。

trans-unit.source: Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` to retrieve only data that was stored in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 设置`autoConvert`参数`false`检索时存储在指定的格式的数据。

trans-unit.source: To convert the stored data to the specified format, set `autoConvert` to `true`, or do not use `autoConvert`.
trans-unit.target: 若要将存储的数据转换为指定的格式，设置`autoConvert`到`true`，或者不使用`autoConvert`。

trans-unit.source: To determine the formats of the data stored in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>, use the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定中存储的数据的格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>，使用以下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> method to retrieve an array of all the formats in which the data is available.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>方法来检索其中的所有格式的数据为可用的数组。

trans-unit.source: Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` to get only the formats in which the data is stored.
trans-unit.target: 设置`autoConvert`参数`false`获取仅在其中存储数据的格式。

trans-unit.source: To get all the formats in which the data is available, set `autoConvert` to `true`, or do not use this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取数据存在的所有格式，设置`autoConvert`到`true`，或不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> method to determine whether stored data is available in a certain format.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>方法来确定是否可在特定的格式存储的数据。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want stored data to be converted to the specified format, set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不希望存储的数据转换为指定的格式，设置`autoConvert`参数`false`。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class for an implementation of this interface.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>的实现此接口的类。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class for the predefined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> data formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>预定义的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>数据格式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the data associated with the specified data format.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定的数据格式关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The format of the data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的数据的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the data associated with the specified data format.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定的数据格式关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with the specified format, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定格式关联的数据，或为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法找不到指定的格式中的数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>的此实例中存储的数据的有效格式的列表。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject,` to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject,`来演示使用`GetData`方法。

trans-unit.source: The method is used to retrieve the data stored in `myDataObject`, which is associated with the `Text` format.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于检索中存储的数据`myDataObject`，其关联`Text`格式。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have already created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> named `textBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你已创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>名为`textBox1`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the format of the data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示要检索的数据的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the data associated with the specified class type format.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定的类类型格式关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with the specified format, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定格式关联的数据，或为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法找不到指定的格式中的数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>的此实例中存储的数据的有效格式的列表。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`GetData`方法。

trans-unit.source: The method is used to retrieve the data stored in `myObject`, which is associated with a specific type, `myType`.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于检索中存储的数据`myObject`，这是与特定类型，关联`myType`。

trans-unit.source: The type of the retrieved data is displayed in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在消息框中显示的检索到的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have already created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你已创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: The format of the data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的数据的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to convert the data to the specified format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 将数据转换成指定格式，值为 <see langword="true" />；反之，值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the data associated with the specified data format, using a Boolean to determine whether to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定数据格式相关联的数据，并使用一个布尔值确定是否将数据转换成该格式。

trans-unit.source: The data associated with the specified format, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定格式关联的数据，或为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果`autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法不能在指定的格式中查找数据，它会尝试将数据转换为格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或使用存储数据`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果`autoConvert`参数是`false`，此方法返回数据中指定的格式，或`null`如果找不到此格式中的没有数据。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetDataPresent%2A> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否数据相关联，或者可以转换为一种格式，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetDataPresent%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>的此实例中存储的数据的有效格式的列表。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`GetData`方法。

trans-unit.source: The example retrieves the data stored in a `DataObject`, using the `autoConvert` parameter to specify whether or not to convert the data format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将检索中存储的数据`DataObject`，使用`autoConvert`参数来指定是否要转换的数据格式。

trans-unit.source: First, `myDataObject` is created with text data.
trans-unit.target: 首先，`myDataObject`创建了文本数据。

trans-unit.source: Then the example tries twice to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: 然后此示例尝试两次检索数据。

trans-unit.source: In the first trial, it specifies its format as a string and sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 它可以在第一个试用版，来指定作为一个字符串，并设置其格式`autoConvert`参数`false`。

trans-unit.source: This trial fails, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #1."
trans-unit.target: 此试用版失败，并标记为"消息 #1。"消息框中显示结果

trans-unit.source: In the second trial, the example retrieves the same data with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个试用版，该示例将检索具有的相同数据`autoConvert`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: This trial succeeds, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #2."
trans-unit.target: 此试用版成功，并且结果显示在标记为"消息 #2。"消息框

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether data stored in this instance is associated with the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 确定此实例中存储的数据是否与指定的格式关联。

trans-unit.source: The format for which to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether data stored in this instance is associated with, or can be converted to, the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 确定此实例中存储的数据是否与指定的格式关联，或是否可以转换成指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data stored in this instance is associated with, or can be converted to, the specified format; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此实例中存储的数据与指定的格式关联，或者可以转换成指定的格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine whether a format exists in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以确定此中是否存在一种格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> for the formats that are available in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>于此实例中可用的格式。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetDataPresent` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`GetDataPresent`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a data object using a string and the `Text` format.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建一个使用字符串的数据对象和`Text`格式。

trans-unit.source: Then it verifies that the data is present in the `Text` format and displays the results in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后它验证数据是否出现在`Text`格式化并在消息框中显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the format for which to check.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示要检查的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether data stored in this instance is associated with, or can be converted to, the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 确定此实例中存储的数据是否与指定的格式关联，或是否可以转换成指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data stored in this instance is associated with, or can be converted to, the specified format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此实例中存储的数据与指定的格式关联，或者可以转换成指定的格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine whether a format exists in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以确定此中是否存在一种格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> for the formats that are available in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>于此实例中可用的格式。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetDataPresent` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`GetDataPresent`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a component (`myComponent`) and stores it in a data object (`myDataObject`).
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建一个组件 (`myComponent`) 并将其存储在数据对象中 (`myDataObject`)。

trans-unit.source: Then it checks whether the specified data is stored in `myDataObject`.
trans-unit.target: 然后它会检查是否指定的数据存储在`myDataObject`。

trans-unit.source: If the test evaluates `true`, it displays the result in a message box and displays the data type in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 如果测试的计算结果`true`，它在消息框中显示结果，并在文本框中显示的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have already created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> named `textBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>名为`textBox1`。

trans-unit.source: The format for which to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to determine whether data stored in this instance can be converted to the specified format; <see langword="false" /> to check whether the data is in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 值为 <see langword="true" /> 时，确定此实例中存储的数据是否可以转换成指定的格式；值为 <see langword="false" /> 时，检查数据的格式是否为指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether data stored in this instance is associated with the specified format, using a Boolean value to determine whether to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 确定该实例中存储的数据是否与指定格式关联，同时使用一个布尔值确定是否将数据转换成此格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data is in, or can be converted to, the specified format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据采用指定的格式，或者可以转换成指定的格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine whether a format exists in this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以确定此中是否存在一种格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> for the formats that are available in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>于此实例中可用的格式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`时：

trans-unit.source: The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and the data is in a format that can be converted to the appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: `autoConvert`参数是`true`的数据也可以转换为适当的格式的格式。

trans-unit.source: The `autoConvert` parameter is `false` and the data is in the appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: `autoConvert`参数是`false`和该数据会在适当的格式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` when:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`false`时：

trans-unit.source: The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, and it cannot convert data to the specified format, or the data was stored with `autoConvert` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法不能在指定的格式中, 查找数据和它不能将数据转换为指定的格式，或使用存储数据`autoConvert`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, and data does not exist in this instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: `autoConvert`参数是`false`，，在此实例中指定的格式不存在数据。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetDataPresent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetDataPresent` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`GetDataPresent`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `Text` format.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建数据对象 (`myDataObject`) 使用字符串和`Text`格式。

trans-unit.source: Then it queries the object for data associated with the `Text` format, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 然后它查询的数据与关联的对象`Text`格式，与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: This trial fails, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #1."
trans-unit.target: 此试用版失败，并标记为"消息 #1。"消息框中显示结果

trans-unit.source: In the second trial, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个试用版，它将设置`autoConvert`参数`true`。

trans-unit.source: This trial succeeds, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #2."
trans-unit.target: 此试用版成功，并且结果显示在标记为"消息 #2。"消息框

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在此实例中的数据所关联的或可以转换为的所有格式的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在此实例中的数据所关联的或可以转换为的所有格式的列表。

trans-unit.source: An array of the names that represents a list of all formats that are supported by the data stored in this object.
trans-unit.target: 一组名称，表示此对象中存储的数据所支持的所有格式列表。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to get the supported data formats before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以获取支持的数据格式之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class for the predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>预定义的格式的类。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetFormats` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`GetFormats`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `Text` format.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建数据对象 (`myDataObject`) 使用字符串和`Text`格式。

trans-unit.source: Then it retrieves all the data formats and data conversion formats in the data object, and displays the resulting list in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后它检索所有的数据格式和数据对象中的数据转换格式，并在消息框中显示生成的列表。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to retrieve all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to; <see langword="false" /> to retrieve only native data formats.
trans-unit.target: 值为 <see langword="true" /> 时，检索存储在此实例中的数据所关联的或可以转换成的所有格式；值为 <see langword="false" /> 时，仅检索本机数据格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to, using a Boolean value to determine whether to retrieve all formats that the data can be converted to or only native data formats.
trans-unit.target: 获取该实例中存储的数据所关联或可转换到的所有格式的列表，同时使用一个布尔值确定是检索数据可转换到的所有格式，还是只检索本机数据格式。

trans-unit.source: An array of the names that represents a list of all formats that are supported by the data stored in this object.
trans-unit.target: 一组名称，表示此对象中存储的数据所支持的所有格式列表。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to get the supported data formats before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以获取支持的数据格式之前调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class for the predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>预定义的格式的类。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容，可以将数据转换为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.GetFormats%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetFormats` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`GetFormats`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `UnicodeText` format.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建数据对象 (`myDataObject`) 使用字符串和`UnicodeText`格式。

trans-unit.source: Then it makes two queries to get the formats associated with the data.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使两个查询来获取与数据关联的格式。

trans-unit.source: In the first query, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` : in this case, only the native format of the data is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个查询中，它将设置`autoConvert`参数`false`： 在这种情况下，返回的数据本机格式。

trans-unit.source: In the second query, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `true`, so that it gets the list of formats, including the formats that the data can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个查询中，它将设置`autoConvert`参数`true`，以便它获取的格式，包括数据可以转换为的格式的列表。

trans-unit.source: In each case, the resulting list is displayed in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在每种情况下，生成的列表显示消息框中。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: Stores the specified data and its associated format in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 存储此实例中的指定数据及其关联格式。

trans-unit.source: The data to store.
trans-unit.target: 要存储的数据。

trans-unit.source: Stores the specified data in this instance, using the class of the data for the format.
trans-unit.target: 使用此格式的数据类存储此实例中的指定数据。

trans-unit.source: The format is derived from the data class.
trans-unit.target: 格式被派生自数据类。

trans-unit.source: Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 它检索时，可将数据存储使用此方法转换兼容的格式。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`SetData`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a component (`myComponent`) and stores it in a data object (`myDataObject`).
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建一个组件 (`myComponent`) 并将其存储在数据对象中 (`myDataObject`)。

trans-unit.source: Then it checks whether the specified data is stored in the data object, and displays the result in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后它会检查是否指定的数据存储在数据对象，并在消息框中显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: The format associated with the data.
trans-unit.target: 与数据关联的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: The data to store.
trans-unit.target: 要存储的数据。

trans-unit.source: Stores the specified data and its associated format in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 存储此实例中的指定数据及其关联格式。

trans-unit.source: If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不知道的目标应用程序的格式，你可以在使用此方法的多种格式存储数据。

trans-unit.source: Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 它检索时，可将数据存储使用此方法转换兼容的格式。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`SetData`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) and stores a string in the object specifying the `UnicodeText` format.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建数据对象 (`myDataObject`) 并将字符串存储在对象指定`UnicodeText`格式。

trans-unit.source: Then it retrieves that data stored in the object specifying the `Text` format, so that the data is converted to the `Text` format.
trans-unit.target: 然后它将检索存储在对象指定数据`Text`格式，以便将数据转换为`Text`格式。

trans-unit.source: The result is displayed in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 结果显示在一个消息框中。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the format associated with the data.
trans-unit.target: 表示与数据关联的格式的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: The data to store.
trans-unit.target: 要存储的数据。

trans-unit.source: Stores the specified data and its associated class type in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 存储此实例中的指定数据及其关联类类型。

trans-unit.source: If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不知道的目标应用程序的格式，你可以在使用此方法的多种格式存储数据。

trans-unit.source: Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 它检索时，可将数据存储使用此方法转换兼容的格式。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`SetData`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a component (`myComponent`) and stores it in a data object (`myDataObject`), using `myType` to specify the data format.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建一个组件 (`myComponent`) 并将其存储在数据对象中 (`myDataObject`)，并使用`myType`若要指定数据格式。

trans-unit.source: Then it checks whether the data of the specified type is stored in the object, and displays the result in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后它会检查是否指定类型的数据存储在对象中，并在消息框中显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: The format associated with the data.
trans-unit.target: 与数据关联的格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> 以获取预定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow the data to be converted to another format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许将数据转换成另一格式，值为 <see langword="true" />；否则，值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The data to store.
trans-unit.target: 要存储的数据。

trans-unit.source: Stores the specified data and its associated format in this instance, using a Boolean value to specify whether the data can be converted to another format.
trans-unit.target: 在该实例中存储指定的数据及其关联格式，同时使用一个布尔值指定数据能否转换成另一格式。

trans-unit.source: If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不知道的目标应用程序的格式，你可以在使用此方法的多种格式存储数据。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类，该类实现`IDataObject`来说明如何使用`SetData`方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) and stores a `UnicodeText` string in it, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建数据对象 (`myDataObject`)，并将存储`UnicodeText`字符串中，替换为`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Then it retrieves the format(s) associated with the data stored in the object and displays the result in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后它检索与对象中存储的数据相关联的格式，并在消息框中显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The only format associated with the data is the `UnicodeText` format.
trans-unit.target: 与数据关联的唯一格式是`UnicodeText`格式。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名为`Form1`。
